column6: WORLD'S MOST WANTED PART 3 Tony Stark is wanted for questioning by Norman Osborn and H.A.M.M.E.R. Will Stark stay and attempt to clear his name or will he make a run for it? Plus, a special upgrade for Pepper Potts!
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Frank D'Armata | other:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Matt Fraction | inker:Salvador Larroca
